title: line
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The line tag is used to draw a straight line between two points on a web page.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Draw a black line from point (10,10) to point (50,50)
usageExamples.code: <line x1='10' y1='10' x2='50' y2='50' stroke='black' strokeWidth='2' />

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Draw a red line from point (30,30) to point (100,100)
usageExamples.code: <line x1='30' y1='30' x2='100' y2='100' stroke='red' strokeWidth='1' />

usageExamples.title: Example 3
usageExamples.description: Draw a blue line from point (50,10) to point (70,90)
usageExamples.code: <line x1='50' y1='10' x2='70' y2='90' stroke='blue' strokeWidth='3' />
